message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal for you, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my budget. However, I'm only able to go as high as $9,000 right now. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is still a little lower than what I'm looking for.  I'm willing to come down to $9,250. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let me know if you're interested.
